text:
19 years ago, on this day, Hrithik Roshan made his debut in Kaho Naa Pyaar Hai. The popularity of the film made Hrithik Roshan's a popular actor. In no time, he was a sensation among the younger generation, who idolized him for his dance moves. From Kaho Naa Pyaar Hai to Kaabil, Hrithik Roshan's Bollywood journey of two decades is proof that hard work and dedication goes a long way.
Twitter
While the actor was constantly questioned for his 'privilege' and nepotism was a tag that he got as soon as he entered, it's his journey as an actor that proved that he made a firm position in the film industry all by himself.
Twitter
Be it pulling off a comic role in Koi Mil Gayaa to playing the role of Akbar in Ashutosh Gowarikar's period drama Jodha Akbar, Hrithik Roshan slipped into the skin of his characters and made each of his characters visionary.
He may have had a few hits and misses along the way but that never made him keep his acting career in the back burner. He juggled between his Daddy duties and professional life and with so much ease and perfection that till today, he remains one of the most bankable stars, brand endorser and hero in every sense of the word.
